fields.summary: Extra block device mapping in meta-data service doesn't match AWS

fields.summary: Ephemeral block device mappings are displayed incorrectly

fields.description:
*Assessment*

When running _euca-describe-images_ on an EBS-backed EMI that has been registered the following way:
{code}
$ euca-register --name ebs-precise-raw-ephemeral --snapshot snap-EFDB40A1 --root-device-name /dev/sda -b "/dev/sdc=ephemeral0" --region account1-user01@
IMAGE	emi-81D53C0E
{code}
The output does not show the <virtualName> field for  _/dev/sdc_ device properly, as seen in AWS for an EBS-backed AMI registered in the same way:
{code}
 aws ec2 describe-images --image-id ami-b5350bdc --profile harold-work --output text
IMAGES	i386	xen	ami-b5350bdc	048212016277/EBS-Precise-LTS	machine	aki-b6aa75df	EBS-Precise-LTS	048212016277	False	/dev/sda1	ebs	available	paravirtual
BLOCKDEVICEMAPPINGS	/dev/sda1
EBS	True	snap-6d60ab7a	8	standard
BLOCKDEVICEMAPPINGS	/dev/sdc	ephemeral0
{code}

*Signs*

Tested euca-describe-images against Eucalyptus and AWS, and got the same result:

*Eucalyptus*
{code}
$ euca-describe-images emi-81D53C0E --region account1-user01@ --debug
2014-01-30 15:32:52,646 DEBUG   DescribeImages parsed arguments: {'all': False, 'userregion': 'account1-user01@', 'filters': None, 'url': None, 'ImageId': ['emi-81D53C0E'], 'shell_configfile': '', 'deprecated_key_id': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'Owner': None, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None, 'ExecutableBy': None}
2014-01-30 15:32:52,646 DEBUG   Config current user set to 'account1-user01'
2014-01-30 15:32:52,646 DEBUG   Config searching regions for option 'ec2-url'
2014-01-30 15:32:52,646 DEBUG   Config   section 'LayinDaSmackDown'
2014-01-30 15:32:52,646 INFO    Config option 'ec2-url' = 'http://10.104.1.216:8773/services/Eucalyptus'
2014-01-30 15:32:52,646 DEBUG   Config searching regions for option 'verify-ssl'
2014-01-30 15:32:52,646 DEBUG   Config   section 'LayinDaSmackDown'
2014-01-30 15:32:52,646 DEBUG   Config   section '*'
2014-01-30 15:32:52,646 INFO    Config option 'verify-ssl' not found
2014-01-30 15:32:52,647 DEBUG   Config searching users for option 'key-id'
2014-01-30 15:32:52,647 DEBUG   Config   section 'account1-user01'
2014-01-30 15:32:52,647 INFO    Config option 'key-id' = 'AKIYO5GIWPS4VIRN7ZU2'
2014-01-30 15:32:52,647 DEBUG   Config searching users for option 'secret-key'
2014-01-30 15:32:52,647 DEBUG   Config   section 'account1-user01'
2014-01-30 15:32:52,647 INFO    Config option 'secret-key' = <redacted>
2014-01-30 15:32:52,650 INFO    DescribeImages parameters: {'Action': 'DescribeImages', 'ImageId.1': 'emi-81D53C0E', 'Version': '2013-02-01'}
2014-01-30 15:32:52,650 INFO    Eucalyptus sending request (attempt 1 of 3)
2014-01-30 15:32:52,651 DEBUG   EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\n10.104.1.216:8773\n/services/Eucalyptus\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKIYO5GIWPS4VIRN7ZU2&Action=DescribeImages&ImageId.1=emi-81D53C0E&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2014-01-30T15%3A32%3A52Z&Version=2013-02-01'
2014-01-30 15:32:52,651 DEBUG   EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: bnwl4qtP3cO7NiWABHw7VOA9dtlKce4d2ZwUMoDoKYI=
2014-01-30 15:32:52,651 DEBUG   EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data
2014-01-30 15:32:52,657 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request method: POST
2014-01-30 15:32:52,657 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request url:    http://10.104.1.216:8773/services/Eucalyptus
2014-01-30 15:32:52,657 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: Content-Length: 237
2014-01-30 15:32:52,657 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
2014-01-30 15:32:52,657 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: Host: 10.104.1.216:8773
2014-01-30 15:32:52,657 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.0.2 (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-358.23.2.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.1.0 requests/1.1.0
2014-01-30 15:32:52,657 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   AWSAccessKeyId: AKIYO5GIWPS4VIRN7ZU2
2014-01-30 15:32:52,657 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Action: DescribeImages
2014-01-30 15:32:52,657 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   ImageId.1: emi-81D53C0E
2014-01-30 15:32:52,657 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Signature: bnwl4qtP3cO7NiWABHw7VOA9dtlKce4d2ZwUMoDoKYI=
2014-01-30 15:32:52,657 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256
2014-01-30 15:32:52,657 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   SignatureVersion: 2
2014-01-30 15:32:52,658 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Timestamp: 2014-01-30T15:32:52Z
2014-01-30 15:32:52,658 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Version: 2013-02-01
2014-01-30 15:32:52,878 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response time: 0.220 seconds
2014-01-30 15:32:52,878 INFO    Eucalyptus response status: 200
2014-01-30 15:32:52,878 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response header: content-length: 886
2014-01-30 15:32:52,878 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8
2014-01-30 15:32:52,879 DEBUG   DescribeImages -- response content --
<DescribeImagesResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2013-02-01/"><imagesSet><item><imageId>emi-81D53C0E</imageId><imageLocation>961915002812/ebs-precise-raw-ephemeral</imageLocation><imageState>available</imageState><imageOwnerId>961915002812</imageOwnerId><isPublic>false</isPublic><productCodes/><architecture>x86_64</architecture><imageType>machine</imageType><platform/><name>ebs-precise-raw-ephemeral</name><rootDeviceType>ebs</rootDeviceType><rootDeviceName>/dev/sda</rootDeviceName><blockDeviceMapping><item><deviceName>/dev/sdc</deviceName><virtualName>ephemeral0</virtualName></item><item><deviceName>/dev/sda</deviceName><ebs><snapshotId>snap-EFDB40A1</snapshotId><volumeSize>6</volumeSize><deleteOnTermination>true</deleteOnTermination></ebs></item></blockDeviceMapping><virtualizationType>hvm</virtualizationType><tagSet/></item></imagesSet></DescribeImagesResponse>
2014-01-30 15:32:52,879 DEBUG   DescribeImages -- end of response content --
IMAGE	emi-81D53C0E	961915002812/ebs-precise-raw-ephemeral	961915002812	available	private	x86_64	machine				ebs	hvm
BLOCKDEVICEMAPPING	/dev/sdc
BLOCKDEVICEMAPPING	/dev/sda	snap-EFDB40A1	6	true
{code}
*AWS*
{code}
$ euca-describe-images ami-b5350bdc -I XXXXXX -S XXXXXXX -U https://ec2.us-east-1.amazonaws.com --debug
2014-01-30 16:05:57,162 DEBUG   DescribeImages parsed arguments: {'all': False, 'userregion': None, 'filters': None, 'url': 'https://ec2.us-east-1.amazonaws.com', 'ImageId': ['ami-b5350bdc'], 'shell_configfile': '', 'deprecated_key_id': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'Owner': None, 'key_id': 'XXXXXXX', 'secret_key': <redacted>, 'ExecutableBy': None}
2014-01-30 16:05:57,162 DEBUG   Config searching regions for option 'ec2-url'
2014-01-30 16:05:57,163 DEBUG   Config   section 'LayinDaSmackDown'
2014-01-30 16:05:57,163 INFO    Config option 'ec2-url' = 'http://10.104.1.216:8773/services/Eucalyptus'
2014-01-30 16:05:57,163 DEBUG   Config searching regions for option 'verify-ssl'
2014-01-30 16:05:57,163 DEBUG   Config   section 'LayinDaSmackDown'
2014-01-30 16:05:57,163 DEBUG   Config   section '*'
2014-01-30 16:05:57,163 INFO    Config option 'verify-ssl' not found
2014-01-30 16:05:57,166 INFO    DescribeImages parameters: {'Action': 'DescribeImages', 'ImageId.1': 'ami-b5350bdc', 'Version': '2013-02-01'}
2014-01-30 16:05:57,167 INFO    Eucalyptus sending request (attempt 1 of 3)
2014-01-30 16:05:57,167 DEBUG   EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\nec2.us-east-1.amazonaws.com\n/\nAWSAccessKeyId=XXXXXXXXX&Action=DescribeImages&ImageId.1=ami-b5350bdc&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2014-01-30T16%3A05%3A57Z&Version=2013-02-01'
2014-01-30 16:05:57,168 DEBUG   EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: n/UCUXoIk5uDifmFnS2l2i5wc5EcBNOE9hBhWzDtmh4=
2014-01-30 16:05:57,168 DEBUG   EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data
2014-01-30 16:05:57,173 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request method: POST
2014-01-30 16:05:57,173 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request url:    https://ec2.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/
2014-01-30 16:05:57,173 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: Content-Length: 239
2014-01-30 16:05:57,173 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
2014-01-30 16:05:57,173 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: Host: ec2.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
2014-01-30 16:05:57,173 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.0.2 (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-358.23.2.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.1.0 requests/1.1.0
2014-01-30 16:05:57,173 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   AWSAccessKeyId: XXXXXXXX
2014-01-30 16:05:57,173 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Action: DescribeImages
2014-01-30 16:05:57,173 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   ImageId.1: ami-b5350bdc
2014-01-30 16:05:57,173 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Signature: n/UCUXoIk5uDifmFnS2l2i5wc5EcBNOE9hBhWzDtmh4=
2014-01-30 16:05:57,174 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256
2014-01-30 16:05:57,174 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   SignatureVersion: 2
2014-01-30 16:05:57,174 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Timestamp: 2014-01-30T16:05:57Z
2014-01-30 16:05:57,174 DEBUG   Eucalyptus request data:   Version: 2013-02-01
2014-01-30 16:05:57,725 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response time: 0.551 seconds
2014-01-30 16:05:57,725 INFO    Eucalyptus response status: 200
2014-01-30 16:05:57,725 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response header: content-type: text/xml;charset=UTF-8
2014-01-30 16:05:57,726 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response header: date: Thu, 30 Jan 2014 16:05:57 GMT
2014-01-30 16:05:57,726 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response header: server: AmazonEC2
2014-01-30 16:05:57,726 DEBUG   Eucalyptus response header: transfer-encoding: chunked
2014-01-30 16:05:57,726 DEBUG   DescribeImages -- response content --
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<DescribeImagesResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2013-02-01/">
    <requestId>11c5542b-ec13-40f6-8f12-8c8367659344</requestId>
    <imagesSet>
        <item>
            <imageId>ami-b5350bdc</imageId>
            <imageLocation>048212016277/EBS-Precise-LTS</imageLocation>
            <imageState>available</imageState>
            <imageOwnerId>048212016277</imageOwnerId>
            <isPublic>false</isPublic>
            <architecture>i386</architecture>
            <imageType>machine</imageType>
            <kernelId>aki-b6aa75df</kernelId>
            <name>EBS-Precise-LTS</name>
            <rootDeviceType>ebs</rootDeviceType>
            <rootDeviceName>/dev/sda1</rootDeviceName>
            <blockDeviceMapping>
                <item>
                    <deviceName>/dev/sda1</deviceName>
                    <ebs>
                        <snapshotId>snap-6d60ab7a</snapshotId>
                        <volumeSize>8</volumeSize>
                        <deleteOnTermination>true</deleteOnTermination>
                        <volumeType>standard</volumeType>
                    </ebs>
                </item>
                <item>
                    <deviceName>/dev/sdc</deviceName>
                    <virtualName>ephemeral0</virtualName>
                </item>
            </blockDeviceMapping>
            <virtualizationType>paravirtual</virtualizationType>
            <hypervisor>xen</hypervisor>
        </item>
    </imagesSet>
</DescribeImagesResponse>
2014-01-30 16:05:57,727 DEBUG   DescribeImages -- end of response content --
IMAGE	ami-b5350bdc	048212016277/EBS-Precise-LTS	048212016277	available	private	i386	machine	aki-b6aa75df			ebs	paravirtual	xen
BLOCKDEVICEMAPPING	/dev/sda1	snap-6d60ab7a	8	true
BLOCKDEVICEMAPPING	/dev/sdc
{code}

*Steps*

* Setup up Eucalyptus 3.4.1 Cloud
* Follow setup mentioned in EUCA-8636
* Run euca-describe-images on registered EBS-backed EMI, observe the results.
fields.summary: euca-describe-images doesn't show EBS-backed EMI block device mapping correctly

comments.body:
Status updated by gholms

This is a duplicate of TOOLS-392.
